major_features.title: Notification
major_features.desc: Shows all user notifications. Inbuilt menu item and user page.

major_features.title: Votes
major_features.desc: Registered user can vote up and down on both question and answers.

major_features.title: Subscription
major_features.desc: User can subscribe to tags, categories or question and get notified for activities.

major_features.title: Points and Reputation
major_features.desc: User gain or loss defined reputation points for every activity. Can be configured.

major_features.title: Flag and moderate
major_features.desc: Hold new posts for moderation and allow community to flag posts.

major_features.title: Best answer
major_features.desc: Original poster or admin can select a best answer for a question.

major_features.title: Private q&a
major_features.desc: User can ask private posts which are only visible to user level above moderator.

major_features.title: Categories
major_features.desc: Category extension for adding category (taxonomy) support for questions.

major_features.title: Tags
major_features.desc: Tag extension for adding tag (taxonomy) support for questions.

features.title: Comments
features.desc: Allow registered user to comment on both question an answer.

features.title: Featured questions
features.desc: Mark a question as featured and it will stick to the top of question list.

features.title: Widgets
features.desc: More then 5+ inbuilt widgets for showing AnsPress contents and links anywhere on your site.

features.title: Image upload
features.desc: Inbuilt image uploader which allows user to attach images in question or answer

features.title: Social login
features.desc: Allow visitors to quickly login using their social account. Read the instructions.

features.title: Syntax Highlighter
features.desc: Allow visitors to add codes in question and answer and highlight it. Read the instructions.
